page.text:
A sturdy blastdoor with "supply room, supply-management only" written on it. It can be only unlocked with a small keypad... If you know the password
Whoever operates this ship does not joke around with food theft.
You remember seeing the password in one of the event logs, you type in "83391" and the door swings open, revealing the hidden treasures!
